DOC.brief_title: DREAM Project Community Health Worker Intervention
DOC.detailed_description: The DREAM ( Diabetes Research , Education , Action Minorities ) Project Community Health Worker ( CHW ) intervention improve diabetic management control among Bangladeshis diabetes New York City ( NYC ) . For two-arm , randomize control trial ( RCT ) , investigator recruit sample 256 participant , 1 ) Bangladeshi descent , 2 ) reside NYC , 3 ) diagnose Type 2 diabetes mellitus ( T2DM ) recent Hemoglobin A1c ( HbA1c ) ≥ 6.5 , 4 ) age 21-85 . The treatment group receive six-month CHW-led intervention consist five monthly group educational session , two one-on-one visit , follow-up phone call need CHW . The control group receive introductory educational session . Primary secondary outcome include clinical behavioral measure , HbA1c weight change , access utilization care ( i.e . appointment keep use specialty care ) , knowledge practice physical activity healthful eating . Additionally , information regard CHW characteristic , process mechanism influence healthful behavior change , fidelity intervention collect . Outcomes measured Baseline , 3-Months , 6-Months group , 12-Months treatment group .
